<Text: The Mihrimah Sultan Mosque (Turkish: 'Mihrimah Sultan Camii' ) is an Ottoman mosque located in the Edirnekapı neighborhood near the Byzantine land walls of Istanbul, Turkey.
Triplets:<The Mihrimah Sultan Mosque
1:
--------------------
Text: Mihrimah Sultan Mosque (Edirnekapı):  Located on the peak of the Sixth Hill near the highest point of the city, the mosque is a prominent landmark in Istanbul.
Triplets:<Mihrimah Sultan Mosque
